mapper.insert: insert into medical_resources_userinfo(u_type, open_id, nick_name, avatar_url, gender, store_name, m_longitude, m_latitude, nation, city, province, district, street, street_number) values(#{uType}, #{openId}, #{nickName}, #{avatarUrl}, #{gender}, #{storeName}, #{mLongitude}, #{mLatitude}, #{nation}, #{city}, #{province}, #{district}, #{street}, #{streetNumber} )
mapper.select: select * from medical_resources_userinfo where store_name like #{keyword} limit #{current_position},#{page_items_count}
